ValidationRule.description:
NICC-019466 Prevents the State field from being changed on CRs that do not have a Product Group of "PMS"
This was originally created for the Breda Office while they are not integrated to TFS. They need to update the State field.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ( AND( ISNEW(),Product_Group__r.Name != "PMS", NOT(ISBLANK(State__c)), NOT(CONTAINS($User.Username, "suser@newmarketinc.com")) ) ) || ( AND( ISCHANGED(State__c), Product_Group__r.Name != "PMS", NOT(CONTAINS($User.Username, "suser@newmarketinc.com")) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not authorized to change the State of this CR
